data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Cantemir to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cantemir, Moldova
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Cantemir unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Cantemir, Moldova.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Cantemir with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Cantemir, Moldova.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Cantemir, Moldova.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Cantemir, Moldova. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, let it be said of the 49,790 lost in Cantemir that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
